name: Power Pop Blast
description:
Tap and smash colorful cubes in the Power Pop Blast crush game! Work your way through thousands of colorful levels, solve puzzles and pop all the cubes. Challenge family and friends and see who can complete all the missions and clear levels- it’s fun and super addictive!

Play this fun puzzle tapping game for free.
Careful - every tap is powerful, you must take it seriously! It’s an addictive and fun tap 2 cubes game for kids and adults to love and enjoy. Cube tap, drag, and smash the bricks, clear the obstacles and win levels in your awesome cube journey.

Join the cube blasting tapping game fun today!
Play through hundreds of exciting levels, beat the obstacles and achieve high scores.
Crushing cubes is absolutely free and totally addictive. Swap and tap 2 tiles, and complete the missions set at the beginning of each level. Collect different items and explode blocks. You have a limited amount of moves to clear a level, so you better think it through and plan your path wisely.


HOW TO PLAY POWER POP BLAST:
- Click on any 2 adjacent cubes of the same color to drag and blast them.
- Play through thousands of challenging levels in this cool cubes game.
- Overcome obstacles and achieve high scores.
- Clear the board and win points.
- Use powerful boosts to advance through the blast game.
- Pop the cubes and win awesome rewards.
- Touch 5 or 6 tiles to get a rocket.
- Match 7 or 8 cubes to get a bomb.
- Swipe cubes to earn a color wheel


AMAZING FEATURES:
- Colorful graphics and designs.
- Fantastic and unique gameplay, tap 2 blocks to blast.
- Tons of exciting puzzles and challenges.
- Easy and fun to learn blast game.
- Completely FREE to play!
- Explore thousands of exciting levels.

Swap and explode all the tiles, and blast the puzzles in this game whenever and wherever you want - no wifi or internet needed!

Tap 2 or more balloon cubes of the same color to clear levels and solve the challenging blast game puzzles. Swipe and blast all the cubes by using special boosters as hammer, truck, spray can and many more.
Clear the board and get awesome coins and rewards in return!
